word: Though the way may be rough, we must exercise implicit faith in the power of the Lord to guide us. The experience of the children of Israel when journeying through the wilderness is a lesson for us on this point. “All the congregation of the children of Israel journeyed from the wilderness of Sin . . . according to the commandments of the Lord, and pitched in Rephidim: and there was no water for the people to drink.”. . .
